#summary Plugin Interfaces

== Introduction ==

Gridworks does not currently support plugins, but they are planned for a future release.  This page keeps track of possible areas which could be exposed as plugin interfaces.


== Possible Interfaces ==

===Commands===
  * GridworkServlet is the class which deals with registering commands

===Importers===
  * CreateProjectCommand is the class which registers importers

===Exporters===
  * ExportRowsCommand is the class which registers exporters

===Facet Scripts===
  * Jython
  * Clojure
